fields.name: St Nicolas Touch Tournament 2019
fields.short_description: Want to play some festive Touch? St Nicolas is a one-day social tournament, that takes place at the beginning of December, around the festival of St Nicolas.
fields.description:
Want to play some festive Touch? St Nicolas is a one-day social tournament, that takes place at the beginning of December, around the festival of St Nicolas.

 

All teams are welcome to join. With a great atmosphere, plenty of Touch to play to keep everyone warm and a fun and friendly after party, this is one not to be missed.

fields.name: National Championships 2019/2020
fields.short_description: This edition will be held over four days throughout the year and at different locations across Flanders, Wallonia and Brussels and will be played in a league format. The overall winner will be announced at the end of the final leg in June.
fields.description:
The next leg of the 2019-2020 national championship will take place on February 2nd at Gent Rugby Club.

Dates:

  • First leg – 12th October 2019, Oudenaarde
  • Second leg – February 2nd 2020, Gent
  • Third leg – April 26th 2020, BUC
  • Fourth leg – June 14th 2020, Kituro

Schedule

The results will come in live on the day.
